name: Bird ↔ Throne
description: Flyer brings feet to base's shins, base bends knees, flyer stands up.

name: Bird ↔ Front Plank
description: Base moves feet up to flyer's shoulders, flyer straightens body.

name: Bird ↔ Star
description: Base splits feet to hip and shoulder, flyer opens up.

name: Bird ↔ Folded Leaf
description: Flyer folds forward bringing hands toward base's head.

name: Throne → Shoulder Stand
description: Flyer dives forward, base catches shoulders, flyer inverts.

name: Star ↔ Whale (Left)
description: Base lowers right foot, flyer shifts weight to left side.

name: Star ↔ Whale (Right)
description: Base lowers left foot, flyer shifts weight to right side.
